title: Heartworms Might Be Much More Ancient Than We Thought

title: J-K: Young Udhampur artist Rahul Sharma blends ancient Dogri culture with modern sculptures
description: In an interview with ANI, Sculptor Rahul Sharma says, "I graduated with a Bachelor of Fine Arts 4-year degree from Jammu University. I have been working for the past three years. The government has made efforts to encourage cultural activities, languages, and traditional outfits. In addition, several government schemes were launched to promote art and culture, such as the Vishwakarma Yojana, have been launched, employing many people."

title: Billionaire Bill Gates Trust's Fossil Fuel Holdings Rise Despite Divestment Claims
description: Although Bill Gates announced in 2019 he would divest from fossil fuels, his trust's investments in these companies have continued to rise.
